characterDescription: Blightwind is the alias by which Yelig-nar is known. Yelig-nar was once the only confirmed member of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. As Yelig-nar, Blightwind was referenced in one of Dalinar's visions when he met with Nohadon. (Yelig-nar had broken into Nohadon's chancery and slaughtered all of Nohadon's wordsmen.)
